Packages 
Package Description
com.rpgcraft
Holds the base code for the mod.
com.rpgcraft.api
Currently holds various utilities for use in drawing the HUD.
com.rpgcraft.client
Contains client-side only code.
com.rpgcraft.crafting
Handles any custom recipes or crafting utilities.
com.rpgcraft.data
Utilities for storing more data than the base engine allows.
com.rpgcraft.events
Event handlers for the mod.
com.rpgcraft.gui
Holds code regarding the drawing of the in game Graphical User Interfaces.
com.rpgcraft.gui.hud.items
Holds various elements to be rendered in the HUD.
com.rpgcraft.item
Allows for custom items in the mod.
com.rpgcraft.packets
Networking - isn't it great?
com.rpgcraft.tiles
Custom blocks! Not really used for much right now.
